Read more about Our annual conference returns. Join us in Toronto, June 5 & 6.

Nominations are now open, recognizing excellence and leadership in green building.

Read more about Nominations are now open, recognizing excellence and leadership in green building.

Register now to learn more about carbon emissions in new and existing buildings.

Read more about Register now to learn more about carbon emissions in new and existing buildings.

Accelerate your green building career with CAGBC.

Read more about Accelerate your green building career with CAGBC.

CAGBC Membership

Take your place in the green building revolution.

Read more about Take your place in the green building revolution.

LEED Certification

Reduce building impacts on people, communities, and environment.

Read more about Reduce building impacts on people, communities, and environment.

Who we are

Building our way forward

The Canada Green Building Council champions green buildings because they are healthier for people and the planet. We believe green buildings are a cost-effective solution for carbon reduction, job creation, and innovation. By transforming our communities with zero-carbon green buildings, we can put Canada on a path to a more sustainable future. 

WHY GREEN BUILDING

5538

LEED certified
buildings

6.8

MILLION TONNES
less GHG emissions from LEED certifications

35.2

MILLION
eMWh of energy savings from LEED certifications

30

current Zero Carbon Building – Performance
certifications

What We Do

CAGBC encourages green building by supporting the people who design, construct and operate buildings. We provide the building sector with innovative standards, verification services, education, and training. Our market research and government advocacy efforts encourage the programs, investments, and policies that will accelerate climate-friendly, zero-carbon buildings, and retrofits. 

Our WORK

Become a member today.

Join Now
